actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE WeighBridge SET
    WB_Docket = 'BU028916',
    Date = '2022-07-19',
    Rego = 'XT19BJ',
    Supplier = 'FORICO',
    Operations = 'GP03LK107H',
    Coupe = 'G132837',
    Harvestor = 'C3 HA / C3 CA',
    FPP = 'FPL0960-02',
    Gross = '48',
    Tare = '18.2',
    GMT = '29.8',
    Grade = 'N20',
    Length = '5.8'
  WHERE Docket = 4958001; -- Specify a valid condition here. Removing the condition may update every row in the table!
